Articles.Content:
In this thread I\'m going to post my progress on a new mod I\'m working on ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Lys Industries

Right now I\'m working on what parts I\'ll make including some concept art.

Concept Art

> 
> ![ConceptArt.jpg](http://lasse.lysdal.org/pics/ConceptArt.jpg)
> 
> 

Progress

> 
> - Ideas 15%
> 
> - Models 3%
> 
> - Texture 0%
> 
> - Balancing 0%
> 
> - Testing 0%
> 
> 

If you want to give me any ideas, feel free to post them ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
How wide is the flash? Is it as wide as the stock fuel tank? (One meter) I could do some modeling/textures if you like.
